pullRequest.title: feat(CRUI): Modifications in Clearing Request table in moderation tab
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please provide a summary of your changes here.


 Added new column Project (project Name as hyperlink to project details page) in Clearing Request table.
 Added new column Components to be clear (Number of directly linked components in NEW state) in Clearing Request table.
 Enabled the Quick Filter for columns in the Clearing Request table.
 Renamed Requested Clearing date to Preferred Clearing Date.
 Renamed Project BU to Business Area / Line.
 Renamed Request Submitted date to CR Created on.
 Fixed the sorting of Request ID column in the Clearing Request table.
 Disabled project closing (project state) on closing of Clearing Request.

Issue: #885
Sample Screenshot:

Suggest Reviewer

You can suggest reviewers here with an @mention.

Checklist
Must:

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR

Signed-off-by: Abdul Kapti abdul.mannankapti@siemens.com
